titleStmt.title: The continuation of our forraine avisoes, since the 27th of the last. Conteining many remarkable late passages out of the High Dutch, out of private letters, & out of the Low Dutch; some part do follow. ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Dawson?] for Nath: Butter and Nicolas Bourne.,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: March 6. Numb. 14.
Imperfect: cropped, tightly bound, and with print bleeding and show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
